titles.title: Up From the Grave He Arose (Low in the Grave He Lay) (Robert Lowry)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Low in the grave He lay, Jesus my Savior, waiting the coming day, Jesus my Lord!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vainly they watch His bed, Jesus my Savior, Vainly they seal the dead, Jesus my Lord!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Death cannot keep its prey, Jesus my Savior; He tore the bars away, Jesus my Lord!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
